txt.en:
'Even the smallest worm has its place in Middle-earth, but it seems that Saruman's corruption can reach those both large and small.

'The worms of Emyn Naer have been feeding upon the corrupt flesh of the wanton slaying of the servants of Saruman. They have grown heavy with the vile flesh, and they no longer feed only upon the remains of the dead, but have been seen feasting upon the living.

'This plague must be put to an end, [placeholder]. The crawlers can be found throughout Emyn Naer, south-west of Echad Dúnann.'
'Though they will not be wholly destroyed as long as Saruman's corruption remains in Eregion, you have eased the burden upon the land.'
'The crawlers can be found throughout Emyn Naer, south-west of Echad Dúnann.'
'You have done a great service for Eregion, [placeholder].'
A plague of crawlers has been a cause of concern for the Elves of Echad Dúnann.
Crawlers can be found at Emyn Naer, south-west of Echad Dúnann.\n\nTinúriel has asked that you slay the corrupt crawlers of Emyn Naer.
Talk to Tinúriel at Echad Dúnann
Tinúriel is in Echad Dúnann, north-east of Emyn Naer.\n\nYou should return at once to Tinúriel and inform her of your success.
